channel.title: Clean PI client
channel.description:
Can anyone direct me to a link with a normal/clean pi client? cant find one anywhere! Any client that is 100% stable with a Blank PI would be grateful.
I wouldn't be posting if I could find one, so please. no "Google" comments, as I've tried and all the links are removed.
Just realized this is in the wrong section.. Where do Client Requests go? - Sorry.

item.title: Clean PI client
item.dc:creator: @Andy1993 Andy1993
item.description:
@Andy1993 wrote:

When I say a clean pi client, I mean a clean client compatible with PI
Jack’s client link is broken.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean PI client
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

A client is a client and not named after any certain base e.g. there is no such thing as a project insanity client!
You can however download any random client and make a source compatible. If you’re looking for something really blank heres a netty framework I released if you want to use it http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,626337.msg4259833.html#msg4259833

or this pi
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/308712-project-insanity-normal-pi-all-dupes-fixed.html

Read full topic
